Grow Your Database Instantly

Find & add candidates in seconds. Integrate in 1 click.

  • Resume parsing technology
  • Email sync & CV uploads
  • Bulk database import
  • LinkedIn integration
  • Local job boards integration

Upload any-format-CVs and CleverStaff converts it into a structured & searchable candidate record.Say goodbye to manual data entry.

Download your candidates CV files automatically from your email. Now you won't lose candidates because of an overstuffed inbox.

Bulk import of CV in ZIP, .doc, .txt or PDF files. Or, we’ll migrate your database from another ATS in 3 days.

Instantly add candidates from LinkedIn in 1 click via browser extension and check their profiles at CleverStaff.

1-click integration with local job boards: cv.lv, hh.ru/ua/by/kz, superjob.ru/ua, etc. Cannot find your one? We'll try to integrate it for you.

Applicant Tracking System

One place to estimate, track, and discuss candidates.

  • Custom job workflow stages
  • Customizable templates for auto-emails
  • Integration with Google Calendar & Outlook Calendar

Change the system accurately for your needs. Edit the hiring funnel, database and forget about redundant data.

Create email templates and send them, when candidates passing through different stages on your vacancy.

Set up interviews and meetings in your calendar directly from your account via integration with Google and Outlook calendars.
